ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Suckage
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That sucks! Except I don t play eq and I couldn t care less The yahoo web side thingie won t let me subscribe to Whispers of the palantir. I found the
ygData.messageBody:
Su wrote:
> But I wasn't in attack mode.It never said anything about me attacking. Also,
> I wasn't in the right screen to have my attack hotkey on. Furthermore, my
> hands were off the keyboard...
> But the npc acted like I attacked when I didn't.. That's why it puzzles me
> so much.
> Oh well, at least I got my lvl back after 3 days of killing stuff.

That sucks! Except I don't play eq and I couldn't care less<g>

The yahoo web side thingie won't let me subscribe to Whispers of
the palantir. I found the WhisperPalantir and clicked join group.
Voila, a new subscription to EQ!

I really, really dislike this fickle yahoo! Why isn't it bankrupt?!?

Get me off please! With sugar on top!


Andreas B.
